name: For Thy Kingdom
description:
For Thy Kingdom is an arcade tower defense game set in the medieval era.

In this game your goal is to defend your castle against hordes of enemies. You can buy towers to help you  fend of these enemies, you also have your own controllable crossbow. These towers and your crossbow can be upgraded. After every level you will get gems depending on how well you did. These gems can be spent on permanent upgrades.
